phrases: In response to the cowardly act of the Terrans who turned on Princess Asseylum,
who came down to Earth in order to make herself a bridge of peace,
we Orbital Knights must deal them a crushing blow!
The Terrans' spilled blood will be our tribute to Her Highness!
I thought I was going to step on you, Matsuribi-senpai!
If you had, you would get hit with a lot worse than point deductions.
That are not even funny, right, Yutaro-chan?
I wish you would stop calling me that...
The landing craft's radar has picked up multiple massive bodies above Shinawara.
We made it out just in time.
It is due entirely to the guidance of your good-natured, beautiful instructor, I am sure.
When I did not see your names on the ferries' passenger manifests, I...
The city is gone, is not it?
It is only a matter of time before we...
We are going to survive this, mark my words.
then maybe you should start by dodging that?
Sheesh, what is the helmsman doing?
If it is not too much trouble, perhaps you could show me around the ship?
My earlier appearance is the result of what I am told
is a form of optical camouflage that employs holography.
The princess was assassinated on the day of the parade.
Her Highness was not feeling well that day.
For that reason, the skeptical security detail leader insisted that a double be used.
So that was not a hypothesis.
When my grandfather the emperor learns that I am alive and well,
this war will come to an end immediately.
I wish to get in touch with Vers as soon as possible.
At the very least, it would be difficult to do from here.
Their jamming makes long-range communications impossible.
And our telecommunications bases have been destroyed, so we cannot use the Net, either.
But we can take you to a facility that can contact the Vers government.
I will talk to my sister Yuki and the others about it.
There is a Vers spy hidden amongst the Terrans!
In league with those assassins, no doubt!
The spy wishes to see Her Highness dead!
I do apologize for dragging you into our problems.
I beg you, keep this matter between us.
I am really glad that we have you here, Dr. Yagarai.
I have not used exoskeleton therapy in a long time.
Please refrain from doing anything crazy.
It will do, it will do!
Just because you are not in pain does not mean there is not any strain on your system.
When that anesthetic wears off, it is going to be unpleasant.
I have got it, do not worry.
I will come in for fine-tuning later, okay?
Or maybe I should have you make a few more adjustments while you are here...
Man, he was a moron up to the very end...
A moron and a perv and a slacker.
Poor bastard, dying and then getting chewed out like this...
He should not have gotten himself killed, then.
They started a war and destroyed the Moon.
They have been up there in the Satellite Belt looking down on us ever since!
For Okojo and every other Terran who was killed!
In an extreme situation where there is no telling when an enemy will come,
human beings are not known for remaining calm and rational.
If they found out that she is a Martian, there is no telling what might happen to her.
You are a real softie, are not you?
The enemy is the people who tried to assassinate her.
If what she says is true, we need to deliver her... Seylum, safely to United Earth HQ.
If I think we are in danger, I will spill everything.
Sir Trillram... is dead, you say?
He was caught in the meteor bombardment.
To think one of us would target my occupied territory under the cover of the battle!
Have they no honor as a fellow Orbital Knight with a common goal?
Sooner or later, I shall uncover his identity and mete out his punishment.
Hunt down the remnant Terrans and burn this place to ashes!
That is why I am going to kill her and make certain this time!
Inflicting further devastation upon a previously conquered area...
Asseylum's sentiments, might that not be...
You imply that you wish to have some say in avenging her?
You think yourself worthy of doing battle at Vers' side?
For 15 long years, we Orbital Knights ingloriously looked out at the Earth
from the shattered Moon, yearning for the day we would reach out and take it!
With her death, the Princess has made that cherished dream a reality!
This battle belongs to the Orbital Knights.
It is no concern of yours!
He is trying to exploit the Princess' death, too.
Trillram was an invited guest at Castle Cruhteo...
If we let her live, my entire clan and its followers will be branded as traitors!
This assassination conspiracy has a ringleader.
I am glad you are safe!
We have been waiting for you!
The amphibious assault craft Wadatsumi is currently taking a longer, safer route.
The seas are a mess thanks to that meteor bombardment.
On XO Mizusaki's orders, we went ahead in Craft 1 with Appaloosa Platoon.
We are here to support you and defend the refugees until the Wadatsumi arrives.
Still... this place was abandoned, was not it?
Even though there is been no damage to this area yet.
Digging in only makes the damage worse.
The best thing is to bug out.
Exactly the opinion I would expect from someone who lived through the war 15 years ago.
We will wait for the Wadatsumi to arrive.
Have anyone who is not busy help with resupplying the landing craft.
We will leave your rations here!
It is unusual for you to offer to help out, Calm.
Yeah, you always played hooky from military drills.
Now, I will do anything if it means wiping out the Martians.
I have set up a three-shift perimeter watch.
I cannot believe a signal cannot cross a few dozen miles.
Prep Craft 1 for liftoff AS SOON AS POSSIBLE!
Surround it and fire at will.
Witness the power of my customized Kataphrakt, the Argyre!
We will get some distance and finish this with SSMs.
Let us regroup out at sea!
That is not the same type as the one this afternoon.
I shall speak with that knight.
What if he is in league with the assassins?
I am aware of the risk.
But that is the only way to keep everyone safe.
You were lucky this afternoon, nothing more!
You must never do something so reckless again!
I will buy us some time.
We are your friends, are not we?
Inko, I need you up there.
We are patching straight into the pressure tank!
No luck with HE rounds, huh?
Then let us try AP rounds.
Rounds that contain no explosives will not detonate in midair.
The tips are evaporating and throwing off the bullets' trajectory...
The heat it is putting out is incredible...
But how long can you last in that Kataphrakt?
Maybe a little more to the right...
Who do you insects think you are?!
Sorry we are late, Captain Magbaredge.
It took a long time to find a safe route.
Mizusaki, would you like to know why you cannot get a date?
I thought you were supposed to arrive fashionably late, madam.
That is a tactic that you use after you have landed a date.
You think you can get away?!
You are not worth my time!
That was really close back there!
It is not like you to be so reckless, Inaho.
Please allow me to avenge Princess Asseylum!
As I recall, I told you that you are not worthy.
